description: George Wendt, the comedian-turned-actor best known for his role as “Norm Peterson” on the classic sitcom Cheers, died Tuesday at the age of 76.

author: Chris Reed
description: You can save a heap of cash on PS5, Xbox Series X, and Nintendo Switch games in these Memorial Day 2025 sales.

author: Scott Collura
description: Feeding Ghosts by Tessa Hulls is the second graphic novel to ever win a Pulitzer Prize. It’s the biggest news in the world of comics, yet no one seems to be talking about it.
title: The Graphic Novel Feeding Ghosts Won the Pulitzer Prize, But for Some Reason It’s Gotten Little Reaction

description: A modern throwback.

description: Don't skimp on something you use several hours per day.

description: Wondering how to watch the Jurassic Park movies in order? We're here to help with a breakdown of the beloved dinosaur series' chronology.

description: Sets a go!

author: Tom Phillips
description: Writing on social media this week, Nobody 2 director Timo Tjahjanto revealed that he had written a treatment for the Kane & Lynch film that would have starred David Harbour — that's Stranger Things' own Jim Hopper, or Red Guardian/Florence Pugh's dad in Thunderbolts*/New Avengers.
title: Long-Lost Kane & Lynch Movie Concept Had Stranger Things, Thunderbolts* Star David Harbour in Mind

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: CD Projekt’s Cyberpunk 2077 sequel, codenamed Project Orion, is a closely guarded secret, but that hasn’t stopped Cyberpunk creator Mike Pondsmith from teasing some previously unknown details about a new city.
title: Cyberpunk 2077 Sequel Project Orion Has Night City and Another City That Feels Like 'Chicago Gone Wrong,' Mike Pondsmith Teases

author: Lex Briscuso
description: If you were expecting scares from Guillermo del Toro’s upcoming Frankenstein film, it’s time to temper your expectations. In fact, according to the man himself, this is far from a horror movie — it’s an “emotional story.”
title: Guillermo del Toro Says He's 'Not Doing a Horror Movie' With Frankenstein: 'It's an Emotional Story For Me'

author: Eric Van Allen
description: A massive new battle has broken out in Helldivers 2. Today, developer Arrowhead Studios brought the fight to Super Earth, as the Illuminate are touching down on the Helldivers' home turf. Everyone is joining in the fight, from the player-led Helldivers to some fresh reinforcements in the SEAF.
title: Helldivers 2 Players Have Had SEAF Buddies For Less Than 24 Hours, And They Already Love Them

author: Christian Wait
description: As of May 18, Amazon has the Surging Sparks Booster Box listed for $227.99. That’s lower than many TCG sellers, but still far above its original $121.99 MSRP. Know what you're paying for before you jump in.
title: Deals For Today: Amazon Is Lower Than Market Value On Surging Sparks Booster Box

author: Jada Griffin
description: This blacksmithing action RPG doesn’t forge a sharp enough edge.
title: Blades of Fire Review

author: Kenny
description: Lilo & Stitch is one of the stronger results of Disney’s non-stop remake campaign, taking the emotional core of the original and amplifying it in a stirring manner.
title: Lilo & Stitch Review

author: coreydemoss
title: TinyBuild Announces Second Annual Showcase for Next Week

author: Tom Phillips
description: Atomfall developer Rebellion has said that its hit British survival game became "immediately profitable" upon release, despite the fact that a chunk of its 2 million players came from Xbox Game Pass — and therefore did not buy the title outright for themselves.
title: Atomfall 'Immediately Profitable' at Launch Despite Countless Players Coming From Game Pass, Developer Discussing Sequel Plans

author: Jacqueline Thomas
description: VPNs are useful for everything, even gaming. Here are the best VPNs for gamers right now.

description: What if Philip K. Dick were resurrected in 2025? Find out in our exclusive preview of Oni Press' mind-bending new series Benjamin.

author: Tom Phillips
description: Stellar Blade is getting a fully-fledged sequel, developer Shift Up has confirmed.
title: Stellar Blade Developer Confirms Sequel Plans

description: Everything you need to know to buy the new Sony WH-1000XM6 headphones, which offer excellent comfort, with terrific wireless, noise cancelling, and voice-isolation technology.
title: Sony WH-1000XM6 Headphones Are Now Available

author: Lex Briscuso
description: Netflix and Supercell have announced that they will bring the Clash video game franchise to the small screen with an animated series set in the world of Clash of Clans and Clash Royale.
title: Netflix Will Produce Animated Series Set in the World of Clash of Clans and Clash Royale

author: Tom Phillips
description: Doug Cockle, the voice of Geralt, has hit back at criticism of The Witcher 4 focusing on Ciri — and told so-called fans of the franchise to "read the damn books."
title: 'That's Just Stupid': Geralt Actor Slams Suggestion The Witcher 4 Starring Ciri Is 'Woke'

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Predator and Alien are set to have a crossover moment in the upcoming Predator: Badlands movie, but could there also be a Xenomorph link in Predator: Killer of Killers? Fans think so.

author: Bo Moore
description: The Asus ROG Swift PG27UCDM is the little brother to the acclaimed PG32UCDM, and is just as, if not slightly more, stunning at this smaller size.
title: Asus ROG Swift PG27UCDM Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Gearbox chief Randy Pitchford has responded to a fan who expressed concern about the prospect of paying $80 for Borderlands 4, saying: “if you’re a real fan, you’ll find a way to make it happen.”
title: As Gamers Express Concern About Borderlands 4 Potentially Costing $80, Gearbox Chief Randy Pitchford Says: ‘If You’re a Real Fan, You’ll Find a Way to Make It Happen’

author: Rebekah Valentine
description: Meet Chris Maple, a Seattle-based designer who unwittingly stumbled into creating one of the most iconic logos in the world: Pokémon.
title: Meet the Man Who Designed Pokémon’s Iconic Logo

author: Matt Fowler
description: What are the best Mission: Impossible movies? What are the worst? We ranked the adventures of Tom Cruise's Ethan Hunt!
title: Ranking the Mission: Impossible Movies

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: NBC Universal has released the final trailer for Jurassic World Rebirth, showing off key elements of the film as well as a good look at old and brand new dinosaurs including the D-Rex and the Mutadon.
title: Final Trailer for Jurassic World Rebirth Shows the River Raft Scene From Michael Crichton's Jurassic Park, More of the D-Rex, and the Mutadon

author: Tom Phillips
description: The actress behind a key character in Marvel TV series Agatha All Along has said she's pitched MCU boss Kevin Feige a way she could still return — despite her apparent tragic death.
title: Marvel Actress Has Pitched Her Return to Kevin Feige, Despite Tragic Death in Agatha All Along

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 will soon see the release of Patch 8, which publisher Focus Entertainment and developer Saber Interactive have already said heralds the arrival of the hotly anticipated Horde mode. But what else might it include? Recent datamines of Space Marine 2 itself may hold clues, including for the new class, new melee weapon, and a surprising ranged weapon.
title: Ahead of Warhammer 40,000: Space Marine 2 Patch 8, Fans Believe Datamines Have Revealed Everything From the New Class to a New, Much-Wanted Melee Weapon and a Surprising New Gun

author: Tom Phillips
description: Disney has signed up Conan O'Brien for a role in Toy Story 5.
title: Toy Story 5 Adds Conan O'Brien in Mysterious New Role

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Call of Duty fans are still digesting the news that Activision is walking away from Warzone Mobile, the game that was meant to lead the battle royale into a new era. But some are wondering what's next from the franchise amid a declining audience.
title: Amid Game Closures and a Declining Audience, Call of Duty Is in a Rough Spot — So What’s Next?

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo has shown off our first proper look at a Nintendo Switch 2 game cartridge, ahead of the console's launch next month.
title: Here's Our First Look at an Actual Nintendo Switch 2 Cartridge

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Helldivers 2 finally has Super Earth maps to fight on as part of the Heart of Democracy major update, out now across PC and PS5.
title: Helldivers 2 Heart of Democracy Update Finally Brings the Illuminate Invasion to the Streets of Super Earth

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Welcome to Derry has its first trailer, revealing a creepy look at HBO Max’s It prequel series, due out fall 2025.
title: It Prequel HBO Max Series Welcome to Derry Gets Debut Trailer — and a Glimpse at Pennywise the Clown 27 Years Before the Events of the Films

author: Tom Phillips
description: Nintendo Switch 2 is still weeks from launch, and yet a Samsung is already thinking about the console's inevitable future hardware refresh.
title: Nintendo Switch 2 Isn't Even Out Yet, but Report Claims Samsung Keen to Provide OLED Screen in Future Refresh

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: IGN interviews Half-Life lead writer Marc Laidlaw, whose 40-year-old short cyberpunk story is now an episode of Love, Death and Robots on Netflix.
title: Half-Life Writer Marc Laidlaw Never Expected His 40-Year-Old Cyberpunk Story Would Be Turned Into a Love, Death and Robots Episode for Netflix

author: Tristan Ogilvie
description: Deliver At All Costs features some uniquely fun deliveries and a satisfyingly smashable set of cities, but its slapdash story and limited tools for vehicular destruction mean it’s one shipment that’s far from the complete package.
title: Deliver At All Costs Review

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: The Last of Us’ hugely successful TV adaptation was confirmed for Season 3 before Season 2 even kicked off. But will it have a Season 4? Showrunner Craig Mazin has indicated Season 4 is pretty much essential for the series.
title: Will The Last of Us Get a Season 4? Showrunner Craig Mazin Says 'There's No Way to Complete This Narrative' in Season 3

author: Wesley Yin-Poole
description: Naughty Dog chief Neil Druckmann has revealed the studio has a secret, unannounced second game in the works other than Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet. But what is it?
title: The Last of Us Developer Naughty Dog Working on a Second, Unannounced Game Other Than Intergalactic: The Heretic Prophet, Neil Druckmann Confirms

description: From superheroes to Star Wars, stream it all in 4K.
